title: Republicans Drop Trump-Ordered Block On State AI Laws From Defense Bill
description: An anonymous reader quotes a report from Ars Technica: A Donald Trump-backed push has failed to wedge a federal measure that would block states from passing AI laws for a decade into the National Defense Authorization Act (NDAA). House Majority Leader Steve S…
